text:
I am using Apache 1.3.26 (with mod_jk module) and Tomcat 4.1.9. No matter which 
value I specified to maxProcessors of <Connector> in sever.xml, the maxThreads 
of ThreadPool in JK2 handler is still 200. In addition, 200 is a hard-coded 
value of MAX_THREADS in ThreadPool.java. Seems that the max number of threads 
in thread pool is independent to value of maxProcessors. If this is not a bug, 
please let me know what I can do to increase the max number of threads in 
thread pool of JK2 handler. Thanks.
creator: johnnyluk@mail.hongkong.com

text: Added a fix in CVS. Next release should include it.
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com

text:
Hello,
Which release fixes this issue? I'm facing the same here.
creator: whitef@avaya.com

text:
(In reply to comment #2)
> Which release fixes this issue? I'm facing the same here.

You resurrected a bug report that's been closed for nearly eight years concerning two products that haven't been supported for a long, long time.  You might want to consider upgrading...
creator: chuck.caldarale@unisys.com
